00012         // fastSqrt
00013         template <typename genType>
00014         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType fastSqrt
00015         (
00016                 genType const & x
00017         )
00018         {
00019                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559, "'fastSqrt' only accept floating-point input");
00020 
00021                 return genType(1) / fastInverseSqrt(x);
00022         }
00023 
00024         VECTORIZE_VEC(fastSqrt)
00025 
00026         // fastInversesqrt
00027         template <>
00028         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER float fastInverseSqrt<float>(float const & x)
00029         {
00030 #               ifdef __CUDACC__ // Wordaround for a CUDA compiler bug up to CUDA6
00031                         detail::tvec1<T, P> tmp(detail::compute_inversesqrt<detail::tvec1, float, lowp>::call(detail::tvec1<float, lowp>(x)));
00032                         return tmp.x;
00033 #               else
00034                         return detail::compute_inversesqrt<detail::tvec1, float, lowp>::call(detail::tvec1<float, lowp>(x)).x;
00035 #               endif
00036         }
00037 
00038         template <>
00039         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER double fastInverseSqrt<double>(double const & x)
00040         {
00041 #               ifdef __CUDACC__ // Wordaround for a CUDA compiler bug up to CUDA6
00042                         detail::tvec1<T, P> tmp(detail::compute_inversesqrt<detail::tvec1, double, lowp>::call(detail::tvec1<double, lowp>(x)));
00043                         return tmp.x;
00044 #               else
00045                         return detail::compute_inversesqrt<detail::tvec1, double, lowp>::call(detail::tvec1<double, lowp>(x)).x;
00046 #               endif
00047         }
00048 
00049         template <template <class, precision> class vecType, typename T, precision P>
00050         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER vecType<T, P> fastInverseSqrt
00051         (
00052                 vecType<T, P> const & x
00053         )
00054         {
00055                 return detail::compute_inversesqrt<vecType, T, P>::call(x);
00056         }
00057 
00058         VECTORIZE_VEC(fastInverseSqrt)
00059 
00060         // fastLength
00061         template <typename genType>
00062         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType fastLength
00063         (
00064                 genType const & x
00065         )
00066         {
00067                 return abs(x);
00068         }
00069 
00070         template <typename valType, precision P>
00071         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER valType fastLength
00072         (
00073                 detail::tvec2<valType, P> const & x
00074         )
00075         {
00076                 valType sqr = x.x * x.x + x.y * x.y;
00077                 return fastSqrt(sqr);
00078         }
00079 
00080         template <typename valType, precision P>
00081         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER valType fastLength
00082         (
00083                 detail::tvec3<valType, P> const & x
00084         )
00085         {
00086                 valType sqr = x.x * x.x + x.y * x.y + x.z * x.z;
00087                 return fastSqrt(sqr);
00088         }
00089 
00090         template <typename valType, precision P>
00091         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER valType fastLength
00092         (
00093                 detail::tvec4<valType, P> const & x
00094         )
00095         {
00096                 valType sqr = x.x * x.x + x.y * x.y + x.z * x.z + x.w * x.w;
00097                 return fastSqrt(sqr);
00098         }
00099 
00100         // fastDistance
00101         template <typename genType>
00102         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType fastDistance
00103         (
00104                 genType const & x,
00105                 genType const & y
00106         )
00107         {
00108                 return fastLength(y - x);
00109         }

00141         // fastNormalize
00142         template <typename genType>
00143         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType fastNormalize
00144         (
00145                 genType const & x
00146         )
00147         {
00148                 return x > genType(0) ? genType(1) : -genType(1);
00149         }
00150 
00151         template <typename valType, precision P>
00152         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<valType, P> fastNormalize
00153         (
00154                 detail::tvec2<valType, P> const & x
00155         )
00156         {
00157                 valType sqr = x.x * x.x + x.y * x.y;
00158                 return x * fastInverseSqrt(sqr);
00159         }
00160 
00161         template <typename valType, precision P>
00162         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<valType, P> fastNormalize
00163         (
00164                 detail::tvec3<valType, P> const & x
00165         )
00166         {
00167                 valType sqr = x.x * x.x + x.y * x.y + x.z * x.z;
00168                 return x * fastInverseSqrt(sqr);
00169         }
00170 
00171         template <typename valType, precision P>
00172         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec4<valType, P> fastNormalize
00173         (
00174                 detail::tvec4<valType, P> const & x
00175         )
00176         {
00177                 valType sqr = x.x * x.x + x.y * x.y + x.z * x.z + x.w * x.w;
00178                 return x * fastInverseSqrt(sqr);
00179         }
